summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Comeback Scout football monitoring system. All backend APIs (7/7) and frontend features working perfectly. System successfully detects comeback scenarios for superteams, displays real-time statistics, and provides browser notifications.
passed_tests: GET /api/matches/live - returns 4 live matches with complete statistics
GET /api/alerts - returns 49 alerts with proper structure
POST /api/matches/check-comebacks - creates new alerts (3 created during test)
GET /api/matches/{id} - handles valid and invalid IDs correctly
POST /api/alerts/mark-read/{id} - marks alerts as read successfully
Dashboard loads and displays all components correctly
Live matches display with team logos, scores, and statistics (posse, chutes, xG)
Comeback probability calculation and progress bars (66%, 85% scenarios detected)
10-second polling system active and updating data
Recent alerts section displays 10 historical alerts
Responsive design works on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
Superteam monitoring active (Real Madrid, Manchester City, Bayern Munich, PSG detected)
Real-time data updates confirmed (alerts increased from 37→40→49)
Toast notifications working ('Nova oportunidade: Bayern Munich! 78% de chance de virada')
